statements: SELECT * FROM data_access_monitoring;
SELECT accessed_table, user_id, timestamp FROM data_access_monitoring;
SELECT timestamp, accessed_table, user_id FROM data_access_monitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, accessed_table FROM data_access_monitoring WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM data_access_monitoring WHERE accessed_table = 'Orders' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_access_monitoring WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, accessed_table FROM data_access_monitoring WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM data_access_monitoring WHERE accessed_table = 'employees';
SELECT id, accessed_table, timestamp FROM data_access_monitoring WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY accessed_table ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, accessed_table, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM data_access_monitoring GROUP BY user_id, accessed_table HAVING access_count > 3 ORDER BY access_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_access_log;
SELECT event_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM data_access_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM data_access_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM data_changes_log;
SELECT change_id, user_id, timestamp, table_name, column_name FROM data_changes_log ORDER BY change_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_access_log WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, action FROM data_access_log WHERE event_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM data_access_log WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT timestamp, action FROM data_access_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_actions FROM data_changes_log GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_actions > 5 ORDER BY num_actions DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_access_logs;
SELECT log_id, user_id, accessed_table, access_time FROM data_access_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, user_id, accessed_table, access_time FROM data_access_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM data_changes ORDER BY change_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS change_count FROM data_changes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM data_access_logs;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time FROM data_access_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT log_id, accessed_table, access_time FROM data_access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, accessed_table, access_time FROM data_access_logs WHERE access_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(log_id), MIN(access_time) FROM data_access_logs;
SELECT * FROM data_access_logs ORDER BY accessed_time DESC;
SELECT log_id, accessed_table, accessed_time FROM data_access_logs WHERE access_type = 'read';
SELECT log_id, accessed_table, accessed_time FROM data_access_logs WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT role_id, user_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_access_logs WHERE user_id = '6ba8f40b-ff0d-4a35-904e-8bd6c7f6b7f7';
SELECT accessed_table, accessed_time FROM data_access_logs WHERE access_type = 'read' ORDER BY accessed_time DESC;
SELECT change_id, table_name, change_time FROM data_changes_log WHERE change_type = 'update' ORDER BY change_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin' LIMIT 10;
SELECT audit_time, action_taken FROM compliance_audit_logs WHERE user_id = 'a2e017e9-35d0-4624-9b1a-71a6b08950d9' AND action_taken LIKE '%delete%';
SELECT * FROM access_logs;
SELECT user_id, action_type, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT audit_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_audit ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE deadline > '2023-01-01';
SELECT username, email, role FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role, COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM user_accounts GROUP BY role HAVING user_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_audit WHERE compliance_status LIKE '%pending%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
